page.title: 14Bexhill tourist survey 1
page.content: Taken on Bexhill seafront Sample number:126 No. visitors:84 No. Residents:42 {VISITORS {1.Length of stay: One day=46 One week=20 One month=13 Longer=5 {2.Distance travelled: Locally(<30mls)=24 Under 100 mls=29 Midlands,E.Anglia=14 North,Wales=6 Scotland=6 Abroad=11 (Germany 9, France 1, Canada 1) {3.Reason for coming to Bexhill: Holiday=58 Business=18 Visit friends/family=6 {4.No. visits to Bexhill in last 5yrs: Never=28 Under 2=12 3-5=14 over5=30 {5.Where staying: Not=36 Hotel=8 Guest house=4 Private house=24 Other=12(9 caravan 3 tent)
